      • checkInitValidations

        public static java.lang.String checkInitValidations(android.app.Activity qtActivity,
                                                    java.lang.String qtGatewayID,
                                                    java.lang.String qtReqType,
                                                    java.lang.String qtEnvironment)
        This method validates all the init Params send by the user and required by the SDK
        Parameters:
        qtActivity - activity name
        qtGatewayID - transaction id
        qtReqType - request type: OFFLINE_AADHAAR
        qtEnvironment - environment type: preprod.aadhaarapi.com, prod.aadhaarapi.com
        Returns:
        "Validation check successful" if all init params are correct
